name: Catharsis 2017
description:
Catharsis 2017 - a game by oliver.reyes

  • "Left click" to punch
  • "F" key to enable/disable cartoon reaction faces
  • "M" key  to turn music on/off.
  • "B" key to enable/disable flashing background.

Let it all out. It's okay. We understand.  

While this is definitely a cathartic experience, it doesn't actually solve much. Find and contact your representatives here and here. Impeachment is not out of the question. Previous presidents have been impeached for far less. The grunts and moans are actual grunts and moans from #45. 

Merry Christmas, Tara!
